description.p: You gain domain spells at the cleric levels listed in the Nixon Domain Spells table. See the Divine Domain class feature for how domain spells work.
At 1st level, you gain the ability to fill a room with smoke.

3/Long Rest as an action you can use your shield to fill a 5 radius sphere around you with smoke for 1d4 turns that stunns anyone within it for 1d4 turns on a failed Constitution saving throw equal to the save DC of the spellcaster.
On a succesful saving throw the creature gets stunned for 1 turn.
The caster gets blinded when casting it for 1d2 turns (heads = 1, tails = 2)

sheet.description: 3/long rest as an action you can use your shield to fill a room (5 foot radius around you) for 1d4 turns with smoke that stuns on a failed save

description.p: Starting at 2nd level, you can use your Channel Divinity to heal one of your allies using the power of your deities healthcare, proportional to the "donation" you give.
As an action, you are able to heal one of your allies using the amount of dice you donate for, (example 1d10 of healing being five gold).
the amount of dice you can get from donation is also proportional to half your cleric level (rounded down).

The number of times you can use this feature is based on the level you've reached in this class: 2nd level, once; 6th level, twice; and 18th level, thrice. You regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: Choose one creature (including yourself) you can see within 5ft, and cure it with the power of your deities healthcare with a "donation" in the form of gold.

description.p: At 6th level, you gain the ability to pick a designated player from your party.
Afterwards you will be able to heal this player outside of your own range.

sheet.description: Select a player and gain the ability to heal them outside of your range.

description.p: At 8th level, you gain the ability to infuse your weapon strikes with poison, a gift from your deity.
Once on each of your turns when you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can cause the attack to deal an extra 1d8 fire damage to the target.
When you reach 14th level, the extra damage increases to 2d8.

sheet.description: Add 1d8 fire damage (2d8 at level 14) to your weapon attack once per turn

description.p: Starting at 17th level. 1/long rest you are able to summon and command a "Douglas C-47 Skytrain" into any 20-foot radius,
creating a giant explosion dealing 4d6 fire damage on a successful save, and 8d6 on a failed save.

sheet.description: you gain a free fireball once per long rest
